name: PivotCache
description: Represents the memory cache for a PivotTable report.

properties.name: index
properties.description: Returns a┬ávalue that represents the index number of the object within the collection of similar objects.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Returns the version of Microsoft Excel in which the PivotCache was created.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Identifier for the specified PivotCache object.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Causes the specified cache to be refreshed and associated chart to be redrawn immediately.
